about_the_game:
Defend your home with fruits and towers made of scrap in Sintropia!

Prepare yourself for a strategic battle in Sintropia, a adorable tower defence where you control fruits with special skills to defend your trunk.

Colect resources and build your defences:

During the day, explore the map colecting resources like scrap metal and destroying iron blocks to obtain "scrap" the money of the game. Use the scrap to build and enhance powerfull towers that will defend your trunk from enemy waves.

Control frutis with unique skills:

Lead a army of fruits, each one with their own set of unique skills. Some being faster, other being able to carry more resources, and other ones with special skills like being able to increase the speed of other fruits.

Manage your time wisely:

Time is a precious resource on Sintropia. Use the day time to colect resources, build your defences and prepare for the night. Because when the sun sets, waves of enemies will try to reach your trunk. Utilize your resources strategically to defend your base from the attacks to come.

Download the demo:

The free demo of Sintropia will be avaiable soon! Give us your feedback, revies, and suggestion of interesting game mechanics that you would like to see!

What will come in the final release:

  • Local Co-Op for up to 2 players.
  • Minigames for up to 4 players localy.
  • More than 5 variants for each fruit
  • More than 20 worlds, with each one containing at least 5 stages, each world will introduce a new gimmick, like rain, mud, wind, storms and more.
  • More fruits like the grapes, avocados and cocoa. And also a few vegetables and tubers, like potato, carrot and beets.
  • Better accesibility and difficulty options
  • And more...

short_description: Syntropia is a Tower Defense game where you use fruits with different skills to gather resources during the day, but be careful! You have limited time, because at night, creatures will appear to destroy your tower! Use scrap to build turrets to defend your precious home!
